meanings.definition: A device used to measure the density or specific gravity of a liquid.
meanings.sent1: The scientist used an aerometer to determine the density of the oil.
meanings.sent2: The aerometers in the lab helped in calculating the specific gravity of various liquids.
meanings.sent3: The aerometer seemed to whisper the secrets of the liquid's density to the curious researcher.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was an aerometer, finely tuned to detect the subtle differences in liquid density.
meanings.sent5: The aerometer hummed softly as it revealed the hidden density of the mysterious liquid.

meanings.definition: An instrument used to measure the density of gases.
meanings.sent1: The aerometer indicated the density of the gas in the container.
meanings.sent2: Scientists rely on aerometers to accurately measure the density of different gases.
meanings.sent3: The aerometer and the gas played a silent game of density hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: His words hung in the air, heavy with the density the aerometer had revealed.
meanings.sent5: The aerometer's needle danced joyfully as it unveiled the gas's density to the eager researchers.
